company_overview.mission_statement: ShareID enables real-time, privacy-first identity verification without storing personal or biometric data, redefining digital trust. They aim to provide seamless, anonymous, and highly secure authentication at scale.
key_milestones: Raised 4M in Series A funding (Exact date not found, but confirmed Series A stage)
Joined Google for Startups Accelerator (Date not found)
Developed Authentication-as-a-Service tied to government-issued IDs
company_overview.current_status: Series A stage, fully launched product, participating in Google for Startups Accelerator, actively focusing on advancing fraud detection capabilities, strengthening real-time identity verification, and optimizing AI models for enhanced security and user privacy.
company_overview.unique_value_proposition: ShareID offers a privacy-first, real-time identity verification solution that eliminates the need to store personal or biometric data. By leveraging government-issued IDs and facial recognition (without storing biometric data), ShareID provides a seamless and secure multi-factor authentication process. This improves user experience, enhances security, and simplifies compliance for businesses.
